mapper.select: SELECT t1.*, t2.f_mater_name AS materName FROM t_ware_inventorytraylocalmap t1 LEFT JOIN t_base_materialinfo t2 ON t1.f_mater_code = t2.f_mater_code WHERE t1.f_mater_code = #{materCode,jdbcType=INTEGER} AND t1.f_status = 0 ORDER BY t1.f_produce_date ASC
mapper.update: UPDATE t_ware_inventorytraylocalmap SET f_status = 1 WHERE f_local_code = #{localCode}
UPDATE t_ware_inventorytraylocalmap SET f_status = 0 WHERE f_local_code = #{localCode}
mapper.select: SELECT t.*, (SELECT t2.f_descript FROM t_ware_inventorytraylocalmap as t1 LEFT JOIN t_base_locationinfo as t2 on t1.f_local_code=t2.f_local_code WHERE t1.f_local_code=t.f_local_code LIMIT 1) as descript FROM t_ware_inventorytraylocalmap t WHERE f_batch_no = #{batchNo}
mapper.update: UPDATE t_ware_inventorytraylocalmap SET f_status = 1 WHERE f_sole_code = #{soleCode}
UPDATE t_ware_inventorytraylocalmap SET f_status = 0 WHERE f_sole_code = #{soleCode}
UPDATE t_ware_inventorytraylocalmap SET f_status = 2 WHERE f_sole_code = #{soleCode}
mapper.select: select ifnull(sum(a.f_quality),0) as totalinvent from t_ware_inventorytraylocalmap a where a.f_mater_code=#{materCode} and a.f_subver_id=#{subverId} and a.f_status=0

SELECT invl.*, inv.f_mater_name as materName, inv.f_mater_version, (SELECT t2.f_descript FROM t_ware_inventorytraylocalmap as t1 LEFT JOIN t_base_locationinfo as t2 on t1.f_local_code=t2.f_local_code WHERE t1.f_local_code=invl.f_local_code LIMIT 1) as descript FROM t_ware_inventorytraylocalmap AS invl LEFT JOIN t_ware_inventorydetail AS invd ON invl.f_detail_id = invd.f_id LEFT JOIN t_ware_inventorymain AS inv ON invd.f_main_id = inv.f_id WHERE (invl.f_status = 0 or invl.f_status = 1) and invl.f_tray_rfid=#{trayRfid}

SELECT invl.*, inv.f_mater_name as materName, inv.f_mater_version, li.f_area_block, li.f_area_num, li.f_area_row, li.f_status as localStatus, li.f_up_down, li.f_descript as descript FROM t_ware_inventorytraylocalmap AS invl LEFT JOIN t_ware_inventorydetail AS invd ON invl.f_detail_id = invd.f_id LEFT JOIN t_ware_inventorymain AS inv ON invd.f_main_id = inv.f_id LEFT JOIN t_base_locationinfo AS li ON li.f_local_code=invl.f_local_code WHERE (invl.f_status = 0 or invl.f_status = 1) and invl.f_local_rfid=#{localRfid}
mapper.update: UPDATE t_ware_inventorytraylocalmap SET f_local_rfid = #{1} WHERE f_local_rfid = #{0} AND (f_status=0 OR f_status=1)
